--- grant_privileges.sql
GRANT SELECT(name, level, location), UPDATE(location) ON TABLE employees, contractors TO ROLE hr_manager, hr_member

--- AST
&ast.Grant{
  Grant:     0,
  Privilege: &ast.PrivilegeOnTable{
    Privileges: []ast.TablePrivilege{
      &ast.SelectPrivilege{
        Select:  6,
        Rparen:  34,
        Columns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 13,
            NameEnd: 17,
            Name:    "name",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 19,
            NameEnd: 24,
            Name:    "level",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 26,
            NameEnd: 34,
            Name:    "location",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.UpdatePrivilege{
        Update:  37,
        Rparen:  52,
        Columns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 44,
            NameEnd: 52,
            Name:    "location",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Names: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 63,
        NameEnd: 72,
        Name:    "employees",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 74,
        NameEnd: 85,
        Name:    "contractors",
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 94,
      NameEnd: 104,
      Name:    "hr_manager",
    },
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 106,
      NameEnd: 115,
      Name:    "hr_member",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRANT SELECT(name, level, location), UPDATE(location) ON TABLE employees, contractors TO ROLE hr_manager, hr_member
